Subsetting CompadreDB objects

CompadreDB-Subsetting.Rd

CompadreDB objects can be subset just like a regular data.frame, using either [ or subset(). Note, however, that the mat column will always be retained during subsetting, even if it is not included in the user's column subset.

# S4 method for CompadreDB,ANY,ANY,ANY
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = FALSE)

# S3 method for CompadreDB
subset(x, subset, select, drop = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

x

A CompadreDB object
i

row indices (see [.data.frame)
j

column indices (see [.data.frame)
...

ignored
drop

ignored
subset

logical expression indicating which rows to keep
select

expression indicating which columns to keep

Examples

# subset to the first 10 rows
Compadre[1:10,]
#> A COM(P)ADRE database ('CompadreDB') object with 10 SPECIES and 10 MATRICES.
#> 
#> # A tibble: 10 x 48
#>    mat   SpeciesAuthor SpeciesAccepted CommonName Genus Family Order Class
#>    <lis> <chr>         <chr>           <chr>      <chr> <fct>  <fct> <fct>
#>  1 <S4:… Setaria_incr… Setaria incras… <NA>       Seta… Poace… Poal… Lili…
#>  2 <S4:… Lechea_cernua Lechea cernua   <NA>       Lech… Cista… Malv… Magn…
#>  3 <S4:… Actinostemon… Actinostemon c… <NA>       Acti… Eupho… Malp… Magn…
#>  4 <S4:… Gaura_neomex… Gaura neomexic… <NA>       Gaura Onagr… Myrt… Magn…
#>  5 <S4:… Eriogonum_lo… Eriogonum long… Buckwheat  Erio… Polyg… Cary… Magn…
#>  6 <S4:… Platanthera_… Platanthera ho… <NA>       Plat… Orchi… Aspa… Lili…
#>  7 <S4:… Succisa_prat… Succisa praten… <NA>       Succ… Capri… Dips… Magn…
#>  8 <S4:… Haplopappus_… Pyrrocoma radi… <NA>       Pyrr… Compo… Aste… Magn…
#>  9 <S4:… Astragalus_t… Astragalus tre… <NA>       Astr… Legum… Faba… Magn…
#> 10 <S4:… Plantago_cor… Plantago coron… <NA>       Plan… Plant… Lami… Magn…
#> # ... with 40 more variables: Phylum <fct>, Kingdom <fct>, OrganismType <fct>,
#> #   DicotMonoc <fct>, AngioGymno <fct>, Authors <chr>, Journal <chr>,
#> #   YearPublication <chr>, DOI.ISBN <chr>, AdditionalSource <chr>,
#> #   StudyDuration <dbl>, StudyStart <dbl>, StudyEnd <dbl>,
#> #   AnnualPeriodicity <chr>, NumberPopulations <dbl>, MatrixCriteriaSize <fct>,
#> #   MatrixCriteriaOntogeny <fct>, MatrixCriteriaAge <fct>,
#> #   MatrixPopulation <chr>, Lat <dbl>, Lon <dbl>, Altitude <dbl>,
#> #   Country <fct>, Continent <fct>, Ecoregion <chr>, StudiedSex <fct>,
#> #   MatrixComposite <fct>, MatrixTreatment <chr>, MatrixCaptivity <fct>,
#> #   MatrixStartYear <dbl>, MatrixStartSeason <fct>, MatrixStartMonth <chr>,
#> #   MatrixEndYear <dbl>, MatrixEndSeason <fct>, MatrixEndMonth <chr>,
#> #   MatrixSplit <fct>, MatrixFec <fct>, Observation <fct>,
#> #   MatrixDimension <dbl>, SurvivalIssue <dbl>

# subset to the species 'Echinacea angustifolia'
subset(Compadre, SpeciesAccepted == "Echinacea angustifolia")
#> A COM(P)ADRE database ('CompadreDB') object with 1 SPECIES and 4 MATRICES.
#> 
#> # A tibble: 4 x 48
#>   mat   SpeciesAuthor SpeciesAccepted CommonName Genus Family Order Class Phylum
#>   <lis> <chr>         <chr>           <chr>      <chr> <fct>  <fct> <fct> <fct> 
#> 1 <S4:… Echinacea_an… Echinacea angu… Narrow-le… Echi… Compo… Aste… Magn… Magno…
#> 2 <S4:… Echinacea_an… Echinacea angu… Narrow-le… Echi… Compo… Aste… Magn… Magno…
#> 3 <S4:… Echinacea_an… Echinacea angu… Narrow-le… Echi… Compo… Aste… Magn… Magno…
#> 4 <S4:… Echinacea_an… Echinacea angu… Narrow-le… Echi… Compo… Aste… Magn… Magno…
#> # ... with 39 more variables: Kingdom <fct>, OrganismType <fct>,
#> #   DicotMonoc <fct>, AngioGymno <fct>, Authors <chr>, Journal <chr>,
#> #   YearPublication <chr>, DOI.ISBN <chr>, AdditionalSource <chr>,
#> #   StudyDuration <dbl>, StudyStart <dbl>, StudyEnd <dbl>,
#> #   AnnualPeriodicity <chr>, NumberPopulations <dbl>, MatrixCriteriaSize <fct>,
#> #   MatrixCriteriaOntogeny <fct>, MatrixCriteriaAge <fct>,
#> #   MatrixPopulation <chr>, Lat <dbl>, Lon <dbl>, Altitude <dbl>,
#> #   Country <fct>, Continent <fct>, Ecoregion <chr>, StudiedSex <fct>,
#> #   MatrixComposite <fct>, MatrixTreatment <chr>, MatrixCaptivity <fct>,
#> #   MatrixStartYear <dbl>, MatrixStartSeason <fct>, MatrixStartMonth <chr>,
#> #   MatrixEndYear <dbl>, MatrixEndSeason <fct>, MatrixEndMonth <chr>,
#> #   MatrixSplit <fct>, MatrixFec <fct>, Observation <fct>,
#> #   MatrixDimension <dbl>, SurvivalIssue <dbl>

# remove the column SurvivalIssue
Compadre[,names(Compadre) != "SurvivalIssue"]
#> A COM(P)ADRE database ('CompadreDB') object with 110 SPECIES and 150 MATRICES.
#> 
#> # A tibble: 150 x 47
#>    mat   SpeciesAuthor SpeciesAccepted CommonName Genus Family Order Class
#>    <lis> <chr>         <chr>           <chr>      <chr> <fct>  <fct> <fct>
#>  1 <S4:… Setaria_incr… Setaria incras… <NA>       Seta… Poace… Poal… Lili…
#>  2 <S4:… Lechea_cernua Lechea cernua   <NA>       Lech… Cista… Malv… Magn…
#>  3 <S4:… Actinostemon… Actinostemon c… <NA>       Acti… Eupho… Malp… Magn…
#>  4 <S4:… Gaura_neomex… Gaura neomexic… <NA>       Gaura Onagr… Myrt… Magn…
#>  5 <S4:… Eriogonum_lo… Eriogonum long… Buckwheat  Erio… Polyg… Cary… Magn…
#>  6 <S4:… Platanthera_… Platanthera ho… <NA>       Plat… Orchi… Aspa… Lili…
#>  7 <S4:… Succisa_prat… Succisa praten… <NA>       Succ… Capri… Dips… Magn…
#>  8 <S4:… Haplopappus_… Pyrrocoma radi… <NA>       Pyrr… Compo… Aste… Magn…
#>  9 <S4:… Astragalus_t… Astragalus tre… <NA>       Astr… Legum… Faba… Magn…
#> 10 <S4:… Plantago_cor… Plantago coron… <NA>       Plan… Plant… Lami… Magn…
#> # ... with 140 more rows, and 39 more variables: Phylum <fct>, Kingdom <fct>,
#> #   OrganismType <fct>, DicotMonoc <fct>, AngioGymno <fct>, Authors <chr>,
#> #   Journal <chr>, YearPublication <chr>, DOI.ISBN <chr>,
#> #   AdditionalSource <chr>, StudyDuration <dbl>, StudyStart <dbl>,
#> #   StudyEnd <dbl>, AnnualPeriodicity <chr>, NumberPopulations <dbl>,
#> #   MatrixCriteriaSize <fct>, MatrixCriteriaOntogeny <fct>,
#> #   MatrixCriteriaAge <fct>, MatrixPopulation <chr>, Lat <dbl>, Lon <dbl>,
#> #   Altitude <dbl>, Country <fct>, Continent <fct>, Ecoregion <chr>,
#> #   StudiedSex <fct>, MatrixComposite <fct>, MatrixTreatment <chr>,
#> #   MatrixCaptivity <fct>, MatrixStartYear <dbl>, MatrixStartSeason <fct>,
#> #   MatrixStartMonth <chr>, MatrixEndYear <dbl>, MatrixEndSeason <fct>,
#> #   MatrixEndMonth <chr>, MatrixSplit <fct>, MatrixFec <fct>,
#> #   Observation <fct>, MatrixDimension <dbl>


# NOT RUN {
# column selection doesn't include mat, but mat will still be returned with a
#  along with a warning
subset(Compadre, select = c("SpeciesAccepted", "Authors"))
# }
